column4: As his two prodigal agents hug him, he shrugs them off.
They make the switch. SOMEONE removes the shirt from SOMEONE's face and she hugs him. SOMEONE eyes the cash.
They hug in the street and grin at a Ringo Starr record in a shop.
In expectations, she hugs him in thanks for the architecture of happiness, not in reality.
SOMEONE watches them hug and nuzzle each other.
They hug.
He faces the staff sergeant then hugs him. SOMEONE looks to SOMEONE and the vet.
She hugs him.
She hugs him.
They hug.
they hug again.
They hug.
She shows an engagement ring. The girls rush to hug her.
He hugs her from behind.
He hugs the grenade to his torso as he lies in a fetal position. Slowly, SOMEONE opens his eyes and sits up.
She hugs SOMEONE and leaves the kitchen.
Releasing her hand, he draws her in and kisses her brow. They hug.
Now, she hugs his arm as they walk hand in hand past a cafe. At the SOMEONE house, the young couple enjoys a meal with SOMEONE's father.
He drapes an arm around her shoulder and she hugs his waist as they head inside.
She hugs SOMEONE.
She hugs SOMEONE.
They hug.
He hugs SOMEONE.
As they hug again, SOMEONE sniffs her hair.
The next day they hug again.
As they hug, SOMEONE rests her hand near a spinning table saw.
He goes to her, and they hug.
They hug again.
They hug.
He hugs SOMEONE<Dylan>.
